description: Single storey side/rear (wraparound) extension (following demolition of existing side/rear projections)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings:
01:AS EXISTING PLANS ; 02:AS EXISTING ELEVATIONS & SECTION; 03: PROPOSED PLANS & ELEVATIONS; 04:LOCATION PLAN & SITE BLOCK PLAN;
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
